Abstract Simulation Class for Longitudinal Data

Source: R/SimLongitudinal.R
SimLongitudinal-class.Rd

This class exists to be extended by other classes that simulate longitudinal data. It is not intended to be used directly.

Usage

SimLongitudinal(times = seq(0, 100, 50))

Arguments

times

(numeric) the times to generate observations at.

See also

Other SimLongitudinal: SimLongitudinalClaretBruno-class, SimLongitudinalGSF-class, SimLongitudinalRandomSlope-class, SimLongitudinalSteinFojo-class
